Texts.Chs: 昨晚有一只愚蠢的怪物袭击了这里，它毁了我的^orange;水培托盘^reset;！我没有足够的资源再建造一个，你能帮我从你的^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;里造一个然后带给我吗？
Texts.Eng: A stupid monster came by last night and ^orange;destroyed my hydroponics tray^reset;! I don't have a ^orange;Power Station^reset; to craft one... could you bring one to me?

Texts.Chs: 真棒。你真是个善良的人。作为感谢，请接收这项科技：^orange;麻醉增强^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Awesome. You are good people. As a thanks, have this ^orange;narcotic enhancement^reset; tech!
